Title: Title
You cannot donate at this time. However,: You cannot donate at this time. However, we would be delighted to see you when you are 18.
If you weigh less than 50 kgs you are un: If you weigh less than 50 kgs you are unable to donate at this time. If you weigh more than 130 kgs you are unable to give blood at a mobile blood donor clinic.
If you are a female under 26 years of ag: If you are a female under 26 years of age and are less than 5ft 6 inches (168cms) in height and less than 10st 3lb (65 kgs) your height and weight will need to be assessed to establish your eligibility to donate.
You cannot donate if you have any illnes: You cannot donate if you have any illness or injury which may mean that it is not safe to give your blood to a sick patient.
You cannot donate if you had an endoscop: You cannot donate if you had an endoscopy (scope) in the last 4 months. If you were diagnosed with a medical condition or illness.
You cannot donate for 4 months from the: You cannot donate for 4 months from the date of the tattoo or the piercing.
You cannot donate during pregnancy and f: You cannot donate during pregnancy and for 12 months after your pregnancy.
